lnd_serviceName: Apply to strike off and dissolve a company
lnd_use: Use this service to apply to close a public limited company, a private limited company, or a limited liability partnership (LLP).
lnd_multi_dir: For companies with multiple directors, more than half of the directors need to sign the application before it can be submitted.
lnd_cost: It costs Â£8 and you'll need:
lnd_req1: to sign in to or create a Companies House account, which is different from a WebFiling account
lnd_req4: an email address for each person signing the application
lnd_pay_cc_ch: to pay using a credit or debit card, or a Companies House account
lnd_pay_cc: to pay using a credit or debit card
lnd_download: You can also sign in to this service to download a copy of your application after it has been submitted.
lnd_guidance: guidance for striking off and dissolving a company (opens in a new tab)
